&#3921;&#3906;&#3936;: {C}joyous; remains contented; kind; dear; ease; pleasure; happiness; happily; longing
priti, joy, to like, elated, joyful

{mi dga' ba} be offended, upset, displeased. 1) vi. to be glad, happy, pleased. 2) vi. to like, love, take pleasure in, be fond of, be joyous, delighted. 3) vi. to be better, to be more advantageous. 4) adj. comp. of {dga' po}, {las}, {na dga'} would rather, had better. {gang dga' gyis} just let them go!; inflated
